name: Beat Blitz (itch)
description:
This game was originally made in 2 hours

You play as an unnamed headphones guy who is being attacked by an onslaught of angry cassette tapes. Use the endless supply of discs to fight back! Don't get hit three times, otherwise it's game over! (tip: listen to the background music and it's speed to determine how much health you have left).

Controls:

W,A,S,D: Move

Left Click: Shoot

Move mouse around player to aim

Credits:

Music: Matthew Pablo (https://opengameart.org/content/free-jazzbebop-chase-music, https://opengameart.org/content/a-cloudy-morning-jazz, https://opengameart.org/content/trouble-makers-coolriff-jazz)

Sound Effects: Made by me using Chiptune

Art: Made by me using Aseprite
